channel.title: Engine Error: to many verts
channel.description: Playing the game and got to the point where you are launching the rocket! a minute after i launched the rocket it crashes and gave me this error! " Too many verts for a dynamic vertex buffer (13353>10922) Tell programmer to up VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE! Included the "minidump" you asked for! Other then this AWESOME GAME! hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T2_19_52C0.mdmp (104 KB)

item.title: Engine Error: to many verts
item.dc:creator: pdevore21
item.description:
Playing the game and got to the point where you are launching the rocket! a minute after i launched the rocket it crashes and gave me this error! " Too many verts for a dynamic vertex buffer (13353>10922) Tell programmer to up VERTEX_BUFFER_SIZE!

Included the “minidump” you asked for! Other then this AWESOME GAME!
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T2_19_52C0.mdmp (104 KB)

Read full topic
